title: This assignment tests you, how can you print your name and roll number with help of java program which you have learnt in earlier activity.

questionText.text:
Write a java program to print your Name, Roll number.
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed

title: This assignment will help you to recollect the syntax and semantics while writing and executing a java program.

questions.questionText: Describe what happens if you omit main in the above code

Describe what happens if you omit System.out in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit println in the above code

title: This assignment will help you to recollect the syntax and semantics while writing and executing a java program.

questions.questionText: I typed in the following program. It compiles fine, but when I execute it, I get the error java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: main. What am I doing wrong?
